start.text: Umm... is this gonna be alright?

start_boss.text: This is a really bad idea!
Maybe we should run while we can!

engaged.text: I-I'm not gonna run from you!

need_help.text: They got me pinned! I need assistance!

hull_90.text: Aaaah! They've gotten through my armor!
I've taken hull damage! Someone help!

hull_50.text: My hull's at 50%! Help me or I'm screwed!
Down to half hull! Need help, damn it!

hull_30.text: NOOOO! I don't want to die!

victory.text: Phew... I was worried for a bit there.
